pages.about: PixelWorks India - Web Design & Development Studio in India | About us Home About us What we offer Our services Contact Us About Us Welcome to PixelWorks India, your premier destination for cutting-edge web design and development solutions. Founded in 2020, we have been empowering businesses of all sizes to establish a robust online presence and achieve their digital goals. At PixelWorks India, we believe in the power of creativity, innovation, and collaboration. Our team comprises talented designers, developers, and digital marketers who are passionate about delivering exceptional results for our clients. With years of experience in the industry, we understand the ever-evolving landscape of the digital world. Whether you need a stunning website, an engaging e-commerce platform, or comprehensive SEO services, we have the expertise and resources to bring your vision to life. What sets us apart is our commitment to quality, integrity, and customer satisfaction. We strive to exceed expectations and ensure that every project we undertake is a resounding success. From concept to execution, we work closely with our clients to understand their unique requirements and deliver tailor-made solutions that drive tangible results. At PixelWorks India, we don't just create websites; we craft digital experiences that leave a lasting impression. Our dedication to excellence has earned us the trust and loyalty of numerous clients across various industries. Whether you're a startup looking to make a mark online or an established enterprise seeking to enhance your digital presence, we're here to help you every step of the way. Partner with PixelWorks India today and let us help you unlock the full potential of your online business. Professionalism Benefit from our team's expertise and professionalism. We approach every project with dedication and attention to detail, ensuring that your website reflects the highest standards of quality and craftsmanship. Timely Delivery Count on us to deliver your project on time, every time. With efficient project management and clear communication, we ensure that your website is ready when you need it. Cost-Effective Solutions Get the most value for your money with our cost-effective solutions. We offer competitive pricing without compromising on quality, allowing you to achieve your digital goals within your budget constraints. Client-Centric Approach With a client-centric approach, we ensure that you receive a solution that exceeds your expectations. Transparent Communication We keep you informed every step of the way, providing regular updates and addressing any concerns promptly. Global Reach Our solutions are designed to help you establish a strong online presence, allowing you to reach potential customers across the globe and grow your business exponentially. Why Customers Love Working With Us "PixelWorks India has exceeded our expectations with their exceptional web design services. They took the time to understand our brand and delivered a website that perfectly reflects our vision. We highly recommend their team for any digital project." Rajesh Gupta "I couldn't be happier with the results provided by PixelWorks India. Their professionalism and attention to detail are unmatched. The website they created for us has significantly boosted our online presence and customer engagement. Thank you for your outstanding work!" Priya Patel "Working with PixelWorks India was a breeze from start to finish. Their team went above and beyond to ensure that our website not only looks great but also functions seamlessly. I'm impressed by their expertise and dedication." Amit Sharma "PixelWorks India delivers results. They transformed our outdated website into a modern and user-friendly platform that has received praise from our customers. Their attention to detail and commitment to excellence are commendable." Deepika Singh "Choosing PixelWorks India was one of the best decisions we made for our business. Their team provided valuable insights and delivered a website that perfectly aligns with our brand identity. We're thrilled with the outcome." Kunal Mehta "PixelWorks India is a true partner. Their expertise and dedication have helped us achieve our digital goals. The website they created for us not only looks amazing but also drives results. We're grateful for their outstanding work." Neha Gupta Contacts C-87, First Floor, C Block, Sector 63, Noida, Hazratpur Wajidpur, Uttar Pradesh 201301, India pixelworksindia@gmail.com +91 99 7112 2682 Policy Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions Links Home About us What we offer Our services Contact Us

From performance testing to user experience evaluation, we leave no stone unturned. pages.terms: PixelWorks India - Web Design & Development Studio in India | Terms and Conditions Home About us What we offer Our services Contact Us Terms and Conditions These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of PixelWorks India's Website. By accessing this website we assume you accept these terms and conditions. Do not continue to use PixelWorks India if you do not agree to take all of the terms and conditions stated on this page. The following terminology applies to these Terms and Conditions, Privacy Statement and Disclaimer Notice and all Agreements: "Client", "You" and "Your" refers to you, the person log on this website and compliant to the Company’s terms and conditions. "The Company", "Ourselves", "We", "Our" and "Us", refers to our Company. "Party", "Parties", or "Us", refers to both the Client and ourselves. All terms refer to the offer, acceptance and consideration of payment necessary to undertake the process of our assistance to the Client in the most appropriate manner for the express purpose of meeting the Client’s needs in respect of provision of the Company’s stated services, in accordance with and subject to, prevailing law of India. Any use of the above terminology or other words in the singular, plural, capitalization and/or he/she or they, are taken as interchangeable and therefore as referring to same. Your access to and use of the Service is conditioned on your acceptance of and compliance with these Terms. These Terms apply to all visitors, users, and others who access or use the Service. By accessing or using the Service you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of the terms then you may not access the Service. You are responsible for the Content that you post on or through the Service, including its legality, reliability, and appropriateness. By posting Content on or through the Service, you represent and warrant that: (i) the Content is yours (you own it) and/or you have the right to use it and the right to grant us the rights and license as provided in these Terms, and (ii) that the posting of your Content on or through the Service does not violate the privacy rights, publicity rights, copyrights, contract rights, or any other rights of any person or entity. We reserve the right to terminate the account of anyone found to be infringing on a copyright. You warrant and represent that: You are entitled to post the Comments on our website and have all necessary licenses and consents to do so; The Comments do not invade any intellectual property right, including without limitation copyright, patent or trademark of any third party; The Comments do not contain any defamatory, libelous, offensive, indecent or otherwise unlawful material which is an invasion of privacy The Comments will not be used to solicit or promote business or custom or present commercial activities or unlawful activity. You hereby grant PixelWorks India a non-exclusive license to use, reproduce, edit and authorize others to use, reproduce and edit any of your Comments in any and all forms, formats or media. Hyperlinking to our Content The following organizations may link to our Website without prior written approval: Government agencies; Search engines; News organizations; Online directory distributors may link to our Website in the same manner as they hyperlink to the Websites of other listed businesses; and System wide Accredited Businesses except soliciting non-profit organizations, charity shopping malls, and charity fundraising groups which may not hyperlink to our Web site. License Unless otherwise stated, PixelWorks India and/or its licensors own the intellectual property rights for all material on PixelWorks India. All intellectual property rights are reserved. You may access this from PixelWorks India for your own personal use subjected to restrictions set in these terms and conditions. You must not: Republish material from PixelWorks India Sell, rent or sub-license material from PixelWorks India Reproduce, duplicate or copy material from PixelWorks India Redistribute content from PixelWorks India This Agreement shall begin on the date hereof. Parts of this website offer an opportunity for users to post and exchange opinions and information in certain areas of the website. PixelWorks India does not filter, edit, publish or review Comments prior to their presence on the website. Comments do not reflect the views and opinions of PixelWorks India,its agents and/or affiliates. Comments reflect the views and opinions of the person who post their views and opinions. To the extent permitted by applicable laws, PixelWorks India shall not be liable for the Comments or for any liability, damages or expenses caused and/or suffered as a result of any use of and/or posting of and/or appearance of the Comments on this website. PixelWorks India reserves the right to monitor all Comments and to remove any Comments which can be considered inappropriate, offensive or causes breach of these Terms and Conditions. Governing Law These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of India, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. Our failure to enforce any right or provision of these Terms will not be considered a waiver of those rights. pages.privacy: PixelWorks India - Web Design & Development Studio in India | Privacy Policy Home About us What we offer Our services Contact Us Privacy Policy Your privacy is important to us. It is PixelWorks India's policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect from you across our website, and other sites we own and operate. This page informs you of our policies regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of personal data when you use our Service and the choices you have associated with that data. We use your data to provide and improve the Service. By using the Service, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy. We collect several different types of information for various purposes to provide and improve our Service to you. Personal Data: While using our Service, we may ask you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify you ("Personal Data"). You are free to refuse our request for your personal information, with the understanding that we may be unable to provide you with some of your desired services. We only ask for personal information when we truly need it to provide a service to you. We collect it by fair and lawful means, with your knowledge and consent. We also let you know why we’re collecting it and how it will be used. We don’t share any personally identifying information publicly or with third-parties, except when required to by law. Our website may link to external sites that are not operated by us. Please be aware that we have no control over the content and practices of these sites, and cannot accept responsibility or liability for their respective privacy policies. We only retain collected information for as long as necessary to provide you with your requested service. What data we store, we’ll protect within commercially acceptable means to prevent loss and theft, as well as unauthorized access, disclosure, copying, use or modification. Your continued use of our website will be regarded as acceptance of our practices around privacy and personal information. If you have any questions about how we handle user data and personal information, feel free to contact us pixelworksindia@gmail.com.
